about_the_game:
Soulfire: Crow Hunter

"When the fire thief enters the Dream maze, he might meet the hunters who are wearing the crow masks. Crow Hunter is the rival of the Fire Thief. They have been guarding the wisdom of ancient gods and avoiding his wit and power being stolen by human. They think this knowledge will bring the mortal into disaster. "

This is an Advanced Armor suit that contains four components:

*Crow Hunter Mask
*Crow Hunter Armor
*Crow Hunter Gloves
*Crow Hunter Leggings

This suit is displayed when the player gets advanced armor corresponding components in game.
NOTE: Only for male character!!!

name: Soulfire: The Crow Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/vista/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU (Dual Core recommended)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better (Shader Model 3.0 needs to be supported)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This content requires the base game Soulfire on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
